remarks: A subring always has the same inversion function, for elements that are invertible.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
subrginv.1 $e |- S = ( R |`s A ) $.
subrginv.2 $e |- I = ( invr ` R ) $.
subrginv.3 $e |- U = ( Unit ` S ) $.
subrginv.4 $e |- J = ( invr ` S ) $.
subrginv $p |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. U ) -> ( I ` X ) = ( J ` X ) ) $.
